items.sentence: What Tom did was bad. However, what Mary did was much worse.
How much time do you spend every day doing household chores?
On his way home, Tom met a man who he thought was a plumber.
Tom was given a chemistry set before he even started school?
Tom and John are identical twins, and so are Mary and Alice.
Tom said that he wouldn't go with us because it was raining.
Biking to work saves Tom thirty dollars a week in bus fares.
The family Tom is staying with doesn't live near a bus stop.
Tom is going to be transferred to the head office in Boston.
My stay in Boston lasted three weeks longer than I expected.
The radio station resumed broadcasting soon after the storm.
You don't have to go back to Australia if you don't want to.
I didn't force Tom to do anything that he didn't want to do.
What are some of the possible side effects of this medicine?
You're the only Canadian that I know who doesn't like bacon.
I often ate at that restaurant when I was a college student.
Is it true that private schools are better than public ones?
Did you know that some of the most ardent feminists are men?
Tom bought one loaf of bread, but he should've bought three.
Tom doesn't have any idea where Mary is planning to do that.
